Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Christian De Freitas
Reviews.Content: If you want this same configuration on a 15.6 inch laptop try this link http://amzn.to/1fXsxf9This is a M series 4th gen intel core i3 laptop, the only downside is the graphics card, its slightly slower than the 3rd gen intel core i3 (3210m), you mus be aware that laptops in this price range are not for playing heavy games, these are more oriented to office use.

Reviews.Title: Exactly the same configuration as E040US but slightly cheaper
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Exactly the same configuration as E040US but slightly cheaper.If you are considering to buy E040US, compare to this one first.

Reviews.Title: Amazon was great, computer ok, microsoft 8.1 not
Reviews.Author: BillMerritt
Reviews.Content: Amazon delivered computer on as promised, good price, HP makes good product, Microsoft 8.1 operating system not good, the end

Reviews.Title: Pop-ups
Reviews.Author: Daryl Proulx "DA"
Reviews.Content: I don't know what is going on with this computer.  No matter on what I click, the site I want PLUS an ad pop up.  I'm ready to toss this money grabbing 'thing' in the closet.  It may be good, but I'll never know.

Reviews.Title: Tiz a good computer
Reviews.Author: Kurt
Reviews.Content: i was vary pleased with this laptop it does every thing i want it to do so yeah i recommend it

Reviews.Title: Nice Computer
Reviews.Author: DrChris "Chris"
Reviews.Content: I set this computer up for an old friend. She does email and sewing designs and it worked perfectly for that.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: APS TECH Solution Centre
Reviews.Content: The screen quality is great, the sound is great I also like the type of hard drive. Overall this is a quality laptop given the user take care of it.

Reviews.Title: my pavillion 17-e-146us notebook
Reviews.Author: Ronald Hughes
Reviews.Content: It is every thing I expected it to be yes I would recommend to those I know very good for the price

Reviews.Title: Office notebook. Bad graphic card
Reviews.Author: Mohamed Azzouzi Idrissi
Reviews.Content: The notebook is pretty good. It's a huge screen which I bought in purpose to play cs 1.6 the only bad thing about it it's the graphic card it's not really for games, also while watching Netflix the screen turns off and goes on which it upsted me. Other than that it's a nice laptop..

ProductInfo.Features:
4th generation Intel Core i3-4000M Processor 2.4GHz
17.3-inch diagonal HD+ BrightView LED-backlit display (1600 x 900)
6GB DDR3L SDRAM Memory / 750GB Hard Drive
SuperMulti DVD burner / HP TrueVision HD Webcam with integrated digital microphone
Windows 8.1 64-bit / 802.11b/g/n WLAN
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion 17-e146us 17.3" Notebook PC - Intel Core i3-4000M / 6GB Memory / 750GB HD / SuperMulti DVD / HD Webcam & Microphone / Windows 8.1 64-bit
